title: Netflix backs out of bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, giving studios, HBO, and CNN to Ellison-owned Paramount
summary: Netflix has withdrawn its $83 billion bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, allowing Paramount to complete the acquisition instead. The streamer determined the required price was no longer financially attractive despite strong deal fundamentals.
content: In a one-two punch of centibillion-dollar offers, the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery is over. David Ellison-owned Paramount will acquire Warner Bros. Discovery. Netflix has lost.

zh.title: Netflix放弃竞购华纳兄弟探险公司,将电影制片厂、HBO和CNN留给埃里森旗下的派拉蒙
zh.summary: Netflix已撤回其830亿美元收购华纳兄弟探险公司的竞价,允许派拉蒙完成收购。尽管交易基本面强劲,但这家流媒体公司认为所需价格不再在财务上具有吸引力。

fr.title: Netflix abandonne son offre pour Warner Bros. Discovery, laissant les studios, HBO et CNN à Paramount détenu par Ellison
fr.summary: Netflix a retiré son offre de 83 milliards de dollars pour acquérir Warner Bros. Discovery, permettant à Paramount de conclure l'acquisition à la place. Le diffuseur a jugé que le prix requis n'était plus financièrement attrayant malgré les fondamentaux solides de l'accord.

de.title: Netflix zieht sich aus dem Angebot für Warner Bros. Discovery zurück und überlässt die Studios, HBO und CNN dem von Ellison kontrollierten Paramount
de.summary: Netflix hat sein Angebot von 83 Milliarden Dollar zur Übernahme von Warner Bros. Discovery zurückgezogen und ermöglicht Paramount, die Übernahme stattdessen abzuschließen. Das Unternehmen stellte fest, dass der erforderliche Preis trotz starker Geschäftsfundamente nicht mehr finanziell attraktiv war.

es.title: Netflix se retira de la puja por Warner Bros. Discovery, dejando los estudios, HBO y CNN a Paramount propiedad de Ellison
es.summary: Netflix ha retirado su oferta de $83 mil millones para adquirir Warner Bros. Discovery, permitiendo que Paramount complete la adquisición en su lugar. El servicio de transmisión determinó que el precio requerido ya no era financieramente atractivo a pesar de los fundamentos sólidos del acuerdo.

title: Jack Dorsey just halved the size of Block’s employee base — and he says your company is next
summary: Jack Dorsey cut Block's workforce by nearly half to under 6,000 employees, attributing the downsizing to AI enabling smaller, more efficient teams. Dorsey suggests other companies may follow with similar reductions.
content: Jack Dorsey has long been an open admirer of Elon Musk. Now, it seems, he may have been taking notes.

zh.title: 杰克·多尔西刚刚将Block的员工规模减半——他说你的公司接下来
zh.summary: 杰克·多尔西将Block的员工队伍减少了近一半,至6000人以下,他将缩减归因于AI使更小、更高效的团队成为可能。多尔西暗示其他公司可能会跟进进行类似的裁员。

fr.summary: Jack Dorsey a réduit l'effectif de Block de près de moitié à moins de 6 000 employés, attribuant le redimensionnement à l'IA permettant des équipes plus petites et plus efficaces. Dorsey suggère que d'autres entreprises pourraient suivre avec des réductions similaires.

de.title: Jack Dorsey hat die Größe der Belegschaft von Block gerade halbiert — und er sagt, dass dein Unternehmen als nächstes an der Reihe ist
de.summary: Jack Dorsey hat die Belegschaft von Block um fast die Hälfte auf unter 6.000 Mitarbeiter reduziert und führt die Verringerung darauf zurück, dass KI kleinere, effizientere Teams ermöglicht. Dorsey deutet an, dass andere Unternehmen möglicherweise ähnliche Kürzungen vornehmen werden.

es.summary: Jack Dorsey redujo la fuerza laboral de Block casi a la mitad a menos de 6.000 empleados, atribuyendo la reducción a que la IA permite equipos más pequeños y eficientes. Dorsey sugiere que otras empresas pueden seguir con reducciones similares.

title: Anthropic refuses Pentagon’s new terms, standing firm on lethal autonomous weapons and mass surveillance
summary: Anthropic refused the Pentagon's demands for unrestricted AI system access, maintaining its stance against mass surveillance and lethal autonomous weapons deployment. The company stood firm despite Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth's ultimatum deadline.
content:
Less than 24 hours before the deadline in an ultimatum issued by the Pentagon, Anthropic has refused the Department of Defense's demands for unrestricted access to its AI. 
It's the culmination of a dramatic exchange of public statements, social media posts, and behind-the-scenes negotiations, coming down to Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth's desire to renegotiate all AI labs' current contracts with the military. But Anthropic, so far, has refused to back down from its two current red lines: no mass surveillance of Americans, and no lethal autonomous weapons (or weapons with license to kill targets with no human oversight whatsoever). OpenAI  …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.summary: Anthropic拒绝了五角大楼要求不受限制的AI系统访问权限的要求,坚持其反对大规模监控和致命自主武器部署的立场。尽管国防部长皮特·赫格塞特设定了最后期限,该公司仍然坚守立场。

de.summary: Anthropic lehnte die Forderungen des Pentagons nach unbegrenztem Zugriff auf KI-Systeme ab und behielt seine Position gegen Massenüberwachung und den Einsatz tödlicher autonomer Waffen bei. Das Unternehmen blieb standhaft trotz des Ultimatums von Verteidigungsminister Pete Hegseth.

es.title: Anthropic rechaza los nuevos términos del Pentágono, manteniéndose firme en las armas autónomas letales y la vigilancia masiva
es.summary: Anthropic rechazó las demandas del Pentágono de acceso sin restricciones a los sistemas de IA, manteniendo su posición contra la vigilancia masiva y el despliegue de armas autónomas letales. La empresa se mantuvo firme a pesar del ultimátum del Secretario de Defensa Pete Hegseth.

title: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei stated he cannot accept the Pentagon's requirements for unrestricted military access to the company's AI systems. The refusal marks a significant confrontation as the Defense Department deadline approaches.
content: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

fr.summary: Le PDG d'Anthropic, Dario Amodei, a déclaré qu'il ne pouvait pas accepter les exigences du Pentagone concernant un accès militaire sans restriction aux systèmes d'IA de l'entreprise. Ce refus marque une confrontation importante alors que la date limite du Département de la Défense approche.

de.summary: Der CEO von Anthropic, Dario Amodei, erklärte, dass er die Anforderungen des Pentagons für unbeschränkten Militärzugriff auf die KI-Systeme des Unternehmens nicht akzeptieren kann. Die Verweigerung markiert eine bedeutende Konfrontation, da die Frist des Verteidigungsministeriums näher rückt.

es.summary: El CEO de Anthropic, Dario Amodei, declaró que no puede aceptar los requisitos del Pentágono para acceso militar sin restricciones a los sistemas de IA de la empresa. La negativa marca una confrontación significativa a medida que se acerca la fecha límite del Departamento de Defensa.

title: Neanderthals seemed to have a thing for modern human women
summary: Genetic analysis reveals Neanderthals predominantly mated with modern human females, evidenced by patterns in human DNA called "Neanderthal deserts." The findings provide new understanding of prehistoric human species interactions.
content: "Neanderthal deserts" in our genomes suggest a strong pattern in matings.

zh.title: 尼安德特人似乎对现代人类女性情有独钟
zh.summary: 遗传分析表明尼安德特人主要与现代人类女性交配，这从人类DNA中称为"尼安德特人沙漠"的模式可以看出。这些发现为史前人类物种相互作用提供了新的理解。

fr.title: Les Néandertaliens semblaient avoir un faible pour les femmes humaines modernes
fr.summary: L'analyse génétique révèle que les Néandertaliens se sont principalement accouplés avec des femelles humaines modernes, comme en témoignent les motifs de l'ADN humain appelés « déserts de Néandertal ». Les résultats offrent une nouvelle compréhension des interactions entre les espèces humaines préhistoriques.

de.title: Neandertaler schienen ein Faible für Frauen der modernen Menschheit zu haben
de.summary: Die genetische Analyse zeigt, dass sich Neandertaler hauptsächlich mit modernen menschlichen Frauen gepaart haben, was sich in Mustern der menschlichen DNA widerspiegelt, die als "Neandertaler-Wüsten" bezeichnet werden. Die Ergebnisse bieten ein neues Verständnis der Wechselwirkungen zwischen prähistorischen Menschenarten.

es.title: Los neandertales parecían tener debilidad por las mujeres humanas modernas
es.summary: El análisis genético revela que los neandertales se apareaban predominantemente con hembras humanas modernas, evidenciado por patrones en el ADN humano llamados "desiertos de Neandertal". Los hallazgos proporcionan una nueva comprensión de las interacciones entre especies humanas prehistóricas.

title: Netflix walks away from its deal to buy Warner Bros. after Paramount came back with a better offer
summary: Netflix abandoned its acquisition bid for Warner Bros., HBO, and HBO Max after Paramount offered a higher price that Netflix declined to match. The company cited discipline in avoiding financially unattractivedeals.
content:
Netflix has dropped its $83 billion deal to acquire the Warner Bros. studio, HBO, and its streaming service HBO Max. In an announcement on Thursday, co-CEOs Ted Sarandos and Greg Peters say the streamer is "declining to match" the new bid made by Paramount:
The transaction we negotiated would have created shareholder value with a clear path to regulatory approval. However, we've always been disciplined, and at the price required to match Paramount Skydance's latest offer, the deal is no longer financially attractive, so we are declining to match the Paramount Skydance bid.
We believe we would have been strong stewards of Warner Bros.' i …

Read the full story at The Verge.

title: Microsoft’s Copilot Tasks AI uses its own computer to get things done
summary: Microsoft's Copilot Tasks AI system runs on Microsoft's cloud infrastructure to handle background tasks like scheduling and study planning without draining user device resources. The tool accepts natural language instructions and can run on recurring or one-time basis.
content:
Microsoft is previewing a new AI system, Copilot Tasks, that it says is designed to take care of busywork for you in the background, the company announced on Thursday. The feature takes the load off your device using its own cloud-based computer and browser, allowing it to handle a variety of jobs ranging from scheduling appointments to generating study plans while you do something else.
As noted by Microsoft, you can describe what you need to Copilot Tasks using natural language, and assign Copilot Tasks to complete jobs on a recurring, scheduled, or one-time basis. Copilot Tasks will provide a report once its work is complete.
You can ca …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.summary: 微软的Copilot Tasks AI系统在微软云基础设施上运行，处理日程安排和学习计划等后台任务，无需消耗用户设备资源。该工具接受自然语言指令，可按定期或一次性基础运行。

L'outil accepte les instructions en langage naturel et peut s'exécuter sur une base récurrente ou ponctuelle.

title: Jack Dorsey’s Block cuts nearly half of its staff in AI gamble
summary: Block laid off nearly half its workforce, reducing from over 10,000 to under 6,000 employees, with CEO Jack Dorsey citing AI's ability to enable smaller, more effective teams. Dorsey claims the business remains strong and profitable despite the cuts.
content:
Jack Dorsey's Block, the financial tech company that runs Square and the Cash app, is cutting its workforce by "nearly half" and axing more than 4,000 jobs. The company will shrink from more than 10,000 people to less than 6,000, Dorsey says in a post on X. And the reason why? AI.
"We're not making this decision because we're in trouble," Dorsey says. "Our business is strong. Gross profit continues to grow, we continue to serve more and more customers, and profitability is improving. But something has changed. We're already seeing that the intelligence tools we're creating and using, paired with smaller and flatter teams, are enabling a new …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: Why no magnets in Galaxy S26? Samsung R&D chief explains
summary: Samsung's R&D chief explains the Galaxy S26 lacks built-in magnets because added thickness isn't worthwhile, noting 80-90% of users purchase protective cases anyway. Consumers can use external magnetic accessories with their chosen case.
content:
Magnet rings have changed my life. I grip and mount and satisfyingly snap awesome accessories on and off my phone all day. Even Samsung sells neat ones, like these folding magnetic mirrors. But unlike Apple and Google, Samsung refuses to put the magnets inside the phone.
Why? I asked Samsung's Won-Joon Choi, the executive in charge of both R&D and operations for Samsung's mobile business. He says the added thickness of magnets is a bad tradeoff to make, because you're just going to buy a case anyhow.
"About 80 or 90 percent of people are using a case, and cases with magnets are very popular these days," he tells me.

title: Smartphone sales could be in for their biggest drop ever
summary: The smartphone industry faces a potential record 12.9% shipment decline in 2026 due to RAM shortages caused by AI data center demand, according to IDC forecasts. Average smartphone prices are expected to reach a record $523 despite lower volumes.
content:
The smartphone industry could experience a record-breaking decline in 2026 as a result of the RAM shortage stemming from memory-hungry AI giants. That's according to the latest report from the International Data Corporation (IDC), which forecasts smartphone shipments to plummet 12.9 percent this year, marking its "lowest annual shipment volume in more than a decade."
At the same time, the average selling price for smartphones is set to hit new highs, with IDC predicting a 14 percent increase to a record $523. "While memory prices are projected to stabilize by mid-2027, they are unlikely to return to previous level," IDC senior researcher Na …

content:
The Samsung Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus are "more of the same for more money," my colleague Allison Johnson reported this week. Now, Samsung is confirming what we previously only suspected: RAMageddon is partly to blame.
Samsung's Won-Joon Choi, the COO of its mobile business, tells The Verge that the memory shortage alone made a "significant contribution" to the price. All the increasing material costs factored into the Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus costing $100 more than their predecessors this year, as did tariffs, but the memory was "significant," he tells me.
The S26 does come with double the storage this year at its higher price, with 256GB ra …

content:
In January, Qualcomm hinted to The Verge that it might finally bring its powerful Arm-based Snapdragon processors to Windows gaming handhelds at the 2026 Game Developers Conference in San Francisco - just in time to challenge Nvidia's own first Arm gaming CPU and Intel's first dedicated handheld gaming chips.
But plans have shifted, Qualcomm now tells me. It won't announce any updates to its Snapdragon G Series gaming chips there, nor offer the recently announced updates to the Snapdragon X line for journalists to try or benchmark.

summary: Web aggregator Bright Data is pitching streaming services an alternative to ad-supported models: collecting web data through Samsung Tizen and LG webOS apps to train AI systems. The approach offers streaming services revenue without traditional ads.
content:
This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week.
These days, if you sign up for a new streaming service, you generally have two options: Either pay a massive premium for an ad-free experience, or endure frequent commercial breaks and all the sneaky tracking that comes with ad targeting.
Web data aggregator Bright Data has been pitching streaming service operators on an alternative approach for apps running on Samsung's Tizen and LG's webOS platform - one that comes without ads and sky-high fees. All publishers have to do to u …

title: 8BitDo’s customizable Pro 3 controller is $30 off for the first time
summary: 8BitDo's Pro 3 wireless controller is discounted to $39.99 at Woot with code LEVEL20, marking its biggest discount. The controller features swappable buttons, macro buttons, and works with Switch 2, PC, and mobile devices.
content:
Woot is offering steep discounts on many video games and accessories, some of which are fairly recent releases. No matter what you choose from its sale catalog, you can get up to $30 off your order with the code LEVEL20 used at checkout through the end of the day on February 27th (the sale lasts through March 5th, but the coupon ends beforehand). 8BitDo’s highly customizable Pro 3 controller for Switch 2, PC and mobile devices is getting its biggest discount at Woot, selling for $39.99 (originally $69.99) with the code applied, or $49.99 without the code.
8BitDo Pro 3 Wireless Controller
The Pro 3 features swappable ABXY face buttons and joystick caps, providing players with a highly customizable experience. It also features new L4 and R4 macro buttons between the triggers and its USB-C charging port, along with more durable and power efficient TMR joysticks.

Where to Buy:

 $69.99 $39.99 at Woot (with code LEVEL20)

The Pro 3 is a great, comfortable controller, and its swappable, magnetic face buttons are one of its top features. You can adjust the button layout from Switch to Xbox, or swap them for them for unlabeled button faces that are included with each controller. In terms of hardware features, the Pro 3 is similar to the Ultimate 2, packing TMR joysticks, triggers with adjustable stops, and extra macro buttons. One of the key differences, however, is that it has a PlayStation-style stick layout. It can wake the Switch 2, but its rumble performance is behind some of our favorite Switch 2 controllers. Read our review.
Other Verge-approved deals
Samsung debuted its new Galaxy S26 phones this week along with some new wireless earbuds, the Galaxy Buds 4 lineup. There’s a great preorder deal on the S26 phone, and you can also get a freebie with either of its Buds 4 and Buds 4 Pro. Amazon is offering a free gift card with both sets. The $179.99 Buds 4 include a $20 gift card — not bad — and the $249.99 Buds 4 Pro that offer improved sound and battery life include

title: Democrats to introduce bill aimed at resurrecting IRS Direct File
summary: A group of 160 Democratic lawmakers introduced the Direct File Act to resurrect IRS Direct File, allowing taxpayers to file taxes directly with the government for free. The bill reverses the Trump administration's decision to eliminate the program that was successfully tested and expanded under Biden.
content:
160 Democratic lawmakers from across the country are backing a soon-to-be-introduced bill that would reverse the Trump administration's decision to eliminate IRS Direct File. The Direct File Act, led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) and Rep. Brad Sherman (D-CA), would bring back the option to file taxes directly with the government for free.
The Biden administration first started testing the IRS Direct File system in select states during the 2024 tax season, and it even expanded the system to 25 states in 2025. But uncertainty surrounding IRS Direct File swirled after President Donald Trump came into office, until IRS head Billy Long confirm …
Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.summary: 太空军正在调查联合发射联盟火神号火箭上的助推器异常，该异常与GPS干扰问题有关，官员们预计调查将延长数月。这一持续的问题给太空军的运作和联合发射联盟的发射时间表带来了挑战。

fr.title: ULA ne rend pas le problème d'interférence GPS de la Force spatiale plus facile
fr.summary: La Force spatiale enquête sur une anomalie de propulseur sur le lanceur Vulcan de United Launch Alliance liée à des problèmes d'interférence GPS, les responsables s'attendant à ce que l'enquête s'étende sur plusieurs mois. Le problème persistant présente des défis pour les opérations de la Force spatiale et le calendrier de lancement d'ULA.

de.title: ULA macht das GPS-Interferenzproblem der Weltraummacht nicht einfacher
de.summary: Die Space Force untersucht eine Triebwerksanomalie auf der Vulcan-Rakete von United Launch Alliance im Zusammenhang mit GPS-Interferenzproblemen, und Beamte erwarten, dass sich die Untersuchung über mehrere Monate erstreckt. Das anhaltende Problem stellt Herausforderungen für den Betrieb der Space Force und den Startplan von ULA dar.

es.title: ULA no está haciendo que el problema de interferencia de GPS de la Fuerza Espacial sea más fácil
es.summary: La Fuerza Espacial está investigando una anomalía del impulsor en el cohete Vulcan de United Launch Alliance relacionada con problemas de interferencia de GPS, y se espera que la investigación se extienda por varios meses. El problema en curso presenta desafíos para las operaciones de la Fuerza Espacial y el cronograma de lanzamiento de ULA.

title: Instagram now alerts parents if their teen searches for suicide or self-harm content
summary: Instagram is adding a feature to alert parents when their teens search for suicide or self-harm content, providing families with resources to support their children's mental health. This initiative aims to help parents identify teens at risk and intervene early.
content: Parents will be informed if their teen searches for suicide or self-harm content and offered resources.

zh.summary: Instagram正在添加一项功能，在青少年搜索自杀或自残内容时提醒家长，为家庭提供资源来支持孩子的心理健康。这一举措旨在帮助家长识别有风险的青少年并进行早期干预。

fr.title: Instagram alerte maintenant les parents si leurs ados recherchent du contenu suicidaire ou d'automutilation
fr.summary: Instagram ajoute une fonctionnalité pour alerter les parents lorsque leurs adolescents recherchent du contenu suicidaire ou d'automutilation, en fournissant aux familles des ressources pour soutenir la santé mentale de leurs enfants. Cette initiative vise à aider les parents à identifier les adolescents à risque et à intervenir rapidement.

de.summary: Instagram fügt eine Funktion hinzu, um Eltern zu benachrichtigen, wenn ihre Jugendlichen nach Suizid- oder Selbstverletzen-Inhalten suchen, und stellt Familien Ressourcen zur Verfügung, um die psychische Gesundheit ihrer Kinder zu unterstützen. Diese Initiative soll Eltern helfen, gefährdete Jugendliche zu identifizieren und frühzeitig einzugreifen.

es.title: Instagram ahora alerta a los padres si sus adolescentes buscan contenido de suicidio o autolesiones
es.summary: Instagram está agregando una función para alertar a los padres cuando sus adolescentes buscan contenido de suicidio o autolesiones, proporcionando recursos a las familias para apoyar la salud mental de sus hijos. Esta iniciativa tiene como objetivo ayudar a los padres a identificar adolescentes en riesgo e intervenir temprano.

title: Instagram will alert parents if their kids ‘repeatedly’ search for self-harm topics
summary: Instagram is launching a parental alert system that notifies parents when teens repeatedly search for suicide or self-harm related terms, rolling out first in the US, UK, Australia, and Canada for opted-in supervision accounts. Meta also plans similar protections for its AI chatbots later this year.
content:
The alerts will start rolling out to Teen accounts with parental supervision protections next week. | Image: Meta / The Verge	

Starting next week, Instagram will notify parents to check on their teen searching for terms related to self-harm or suicide. Meta says a similar alert system for its AI chatbots is coming later this year.
The new Instagram feature  sends parents an alert when their child "repeatedly tries to search for terms clearly associated with suicide or self-harm within a short period of time." It's rolling out in the US, UK, Australia, and Canada starting next week, but it's only for parents and teens who opt in to supervision. It's expected to expand to other regions later this year.

Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.title: Instagram将在孩子反复搜索自残话题时提醒家长
zh.summary: Instagram正在推出一个家长提醒系统，当青少年反复搜索自杀或自残相关内容时通知家长，首先在美国、英国、澳大利亚和加拿大为已选择监管的账户推出。Meta还计划今年晚些时候为其AI聊天机器人提供类似保护。

fr.title: Instagram alertera les parents si leurs enfants recherchent régulièrement des sujets d'automutilation

Meta prévoit également des protections similaires pour ses chatbots IA plus tard cette année.

Meta plant außerdem ähnliche Schutzmaßnahmen für seine KI-Chatbots später in diesem Jahr.

es.title: Instagram alertará a los padres si sus hijos buscan repetidamente temas de autolesiones

Meta también planea protecciones similares para sus chatbots de IA más adelante este año.

title: Google takes control of ‘Android of robotics’ project in quest for physical AI
summary: Google is integrating Alphabet's robotics AI company Intrinsic into its core operations after five years as an independent venture, signaling a strategic shift toward physical AI development. The move brings Intrinsic's Android-like robotics platform closer to Google's main business.
content:
Google is folding Alphabet's AI robotics "moonshot," Intrinsic, into the company after five years as an independent unit. The move marks a strategic shift as Google doubles down on physical AI and pulls experimental projects closer to its core business. 
Intrinsic "graduated" into an independent company inside Alphabet's Other Bets division in 2021, a portfolio of high-risk, speculative ventures that also includes robotaxi firm Waymo and healthcare company Verily. It pitches itself as an Android-like layer for robotics, building software and tools that make it easier to create robot applications.

Read the full story at The Verge.

zh.title: 谷歌接管"机器人的安卓"项目，追求物理人工智能
zh.summary: 谷歌将Alphabet的机器人AI公司Intrinsic整合到其核心业务中，该公司在五年前作为独立企业成立，这标志着向物理人工智能发展的战略转变。此举将Intrinsic类似安卓的机器人平台更接近谷歌的主要业务。

fr.title: Google prend le contrôle du projet "Android de la robotique" dans sa quête pour l'IA physique
fr.summary: Google intègre Intrinsic, la société d'IA robotique d'Alphabet, dans ses activités principales après cinq ans en tant qu'entreprise indépendante, signalant un changement stratégique vers le développement de l'IA physique. Cette démarche rapproche la plateforme robotique de type Android d'Intrinsic du cœur de métier de Google.

de.title: Google übernimmt Kontrolle über das "Android der Robotik"-Projekt im Streben nach physischer KI
de.summary: Google integriert Alphabets Robotik-KI-Unternehmen Intrinsic in seine Kernoperationen nach fünf Jahren als unabhängiges Unternehmen, was einen strategischen Wandel in Richtung Entwicklung physischer KI signalisiert. Der Schritt bringt Intrinsics Android-ähnliche Robotik-Plattform näher an Googles Hauptgeschäft.

es.title: Google toma control del proyecto "Android de la robótica" en busca de IA física
es.summary: Google está integrando Intrinsic, la empresa de IA de robótica de Alphabet, en sus operaciones principales después de cinco años como empresa independiente, señalando un cambio estratégico hacia el desarrollo de IA física. El movimiento acerca la plataforma de robótica similar a Android de Intrinsic más cerca del negocio principal de Google.

title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff: This isn’t our first SaaSpocalypse
summary: Salesforce reported strong year-end earnings while addressing concerns about AI threatening its business model. CEO Marc Benioff emphasized the company's resilience through previous technological disruptions. The announcement aims to counter narratives about AI obsolescence in the SaaS sector.
content: Salesforce reported a solid year-end earnings and then pulled out all the stops to ward off more talk of the death of its business to AI.

zh.title: Salesforce首席执行官Marc Benioff：这不是我们第一次"SaaS末日"
zh.summary: Salesforce报告了强劲的年终业绩，同时回应了有关人工智能威胁其商业模式的担忧。首席执行官Marc Benioff强调了该公司在以往技术颠覆中的韧性。这项声明旨在反驳关于SaaS领域AI过时的叙述。

fr.title: Le PDG de Salesforce Marc Benioff : Ce n'est pas notre premier SaaSpocalypse
fr.summary: Salesforce a rapporté de solides résultats de fin d'année tout en abordant les préoccupations concernant l'IA menaçant son modèle commercial. Le PDG Marc Benioff a souligné la résilience de l'entreprise face aux perturbations technologiques précédentes. L'annonce vise à contrer les récits sur l'obsolescence de l'IA dans le secteur du SaaS.

de.title: Salesforce-CEO Marc Benioff: Dies ist nicht unser erstes SaaSpocalypse
de.summary: Salesforce meldete starke Jahresendergebnisse und befasste sich mit Bedenken hinsichtlich der künstlichen Intelligenz, die sein Geschäftsmodell bedroht. CEO Marc Benioff betonte die Widerstandsfähigkeit des Unternehmens gegen frühere technologische Störungen. Die Ankündigung zielt darauf ab, Narrative über die Veralterung von KI im SaaS-Sektor entgegenzuwirken.

es.title: El CEO de Salesforce Marc Benioff: Este no es nuestro primer SaaSpocalipsis
es.summary: Salesforce reportó sólidas ganancias de fin de año mientras abordaba las preocupaciones sobre la IA que amenaza su modelo de negocio. El CEO Marc Benioff enfatizó la resiliencia de la empresa frente a perturbaciones tecnológicas previas. El anuncio tiene como objetivo contrarrestar las narrativas sobre la obsolescencia de la IA en el sector SaaS.

title: Gushwork bets on AI search for customer leads — and early results are emerging
summary: Gushwork, a startup leveraging AI search tools like ChatGPT for customer lead generation, has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. Early customer traction suggests the approach is gaining market interest.
content: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT.

zh.title: Gushwork 押注 AI 搜索获取客户线索——早期成果正在出现
zh.summary: 初创公司 Gushwork 利用 ChatGPT 等 AI 搜索工具进行客户线索生成，已在由 SIG 和 Lightspeed 领投的种子轮中融资 900 万美元。早期客户吸引力表明该方法正在获得市场关注。

fr.title: Gushwork parie sur la recherche IA pour générer des prospects — et les premiers résultats émergent
fr.summary: Gushwork, une startup exploitant des outils de recherche IA comme ChatGPT pour la génération de prospects, a levé 9 millions de dollars au cours d'un tour de financement dirigé par SIG et Lightspeed. L'intérêt des premiers clients suggère que cette approche gagne du terrain.

de.summary: Gushwork, ein Startup, das KI-Suchwerkzeuge wie ChatGPT zur Kundenakquise nutzt, hat in einer von SIG und Lightspeed angeführten Seed-Runde 9 Millionen Dollar aufgebracht. Frühe Kundenbindung deutet darauf hin, dass der Ansatz Marktinteresse gewinnt.

es.summary: Gushwork, una startup que aprovecha herramientas de búsqueda de IA como ChatGPT para la generación de clientes, ha recaudado 9 millones de dólares en una ronda de semilla liderada por SIG y Lightspeed. El interés inicial de los clientes sugiere que el enfoque está ganando tracción en el mercado.
